name: Kanha
greetingText: I really like your name btw! Atiksh bhi thik h But Kanha Meri jaan h
wishText: I would always love to Have a Brother like you in every incarnation of Life My Sweet little bro ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: M Yeh karne wala tha fir
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are My Special Bhai So
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Hamesha Happy Rehna Mera Bhai ,  You are my Bestest Person I can rely on in My whole life. My This life belongs to You . So Thanks for being the Reason for My Life Lil Bro
